page.title: 11RECREATION,PAST & PRESENT.
page.content: Our favourite game is cricket which you play with special equipment, stumps,bails,bat and ball.The positions are bowler, batter, wicket keeper and fielders.The bowler bowls the ball aiming to hit the wickets or the leg to get L.B.W.which means leg before wicket.There is a keen interest.In the village we have our own cricket field plus another club three miles away. At school besides cricket we play rounders, football and the girls play netball but in the village itself cricket is the only organised game. A game our grandparents played is Tip Cap, a game played with 2 sticks.One 6 inches sharpened at each end.The other was 2 foot long.You struck the pointed end of the stick lying in the circle. When in the air you knocked it so it did not land back in the circle.
